game.name: Street Vendor's Journey
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Street Vendor’s Journey is a life-driven street vending simulation. Start with an old family cart, sell goods through honest trade, support your family, and build a better future by managing business, reputation, and daily life.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Street Vendor’s Journey is a life-driven street vending simulation. Start with an old family cart, sell goods through honest trade, support your family, and build a better future by managing business, reputation, and daily life.
